name: Scopus-IWECT 2018 : 2018 2nd International Workshop on Energy Conservation Technologies
content: Welcome to 2018 2nd International Workshop on Energy Conservation Technologies (IWECT 2018). IWECT 2018 is co-organized by Thammasat University, American University of Madaba(AUM) and Asia Pacific Institute of Science and Engineering(APISE). IWECT 2018 will take place in Bangkok, Thailand from Oct. 19-21, 2018\. IWECT 2018 is a not-to-be-missed opportunity that distills the most current knowledge on a rapidly advancing discipline in one conference. Join key researchers and established professionals in the field of Energy Conservation Technologies as they assess the current state-of-the-art and roadmap crucial areas for future research.
